name: GirlFriend VR
description:
Endless sex with your girlfriend! Have all kinds of sex with her whenever, wherever!

By all means, please enjoy this erotic VR game, which we made sure every detail is perfect for, to your heart's content! You are sure to be able to let off a load!

You can move the woman by touching a certain point.

You can toggle mirrors, backgrounds, and other aspects on or off.

・Call her to the couch, bed, bath, restroom, or wherever else you want!
・Engage in all sorts of sex acts, such as masturbating, fellatio, irrumatio, and letting her get on top!

＜Precautions＞

《Controls》
＜Controller Actions＞
・Select and decide using the index finger trigger
・Grab or let go using the middle finger trigger
・Move using the left joystick
・Change direction using the right joystick

＜Smartwatch Actions to Adjust Her Gaze＞
Change the height using the smartwatch on your left hand
You can get rid of the UI display when it is unnecessary and make adjustments when needed
